AGE.caption: Name
AGE.doc: Unique name of this repeating structure, so you can write this name in the element to specify where it will be inserted.
AGE.name: repeating_structure_name

AGL.caption: How many structures
AGL.doc: How many repeated structures you want. For example if you're working with a list of users, use "List of User's:count" to run over the list once for each item. Optionally, you can specify a number by typing it or getting it somehow else, like "5" and the structure will be repeated 5 times.
AGL.name: iterations_count
